## Functions

### disableCodeGen() {#ga0dc161026c3eab1a29f8d0af89900455}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::ThinLTOCodeGenerator::disableCodeGen (bool Disable)"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Disable CodeGen, only run the stages till codegen and stop.

The output will be bitcode.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00240">240</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>.

### setGeneratedObjectsDirectory() {#ga206c4e86f664ea1d9690f55146d7c437}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::ThinLTOCodeGenerator::setGeneratedObjectsDirectory (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/demangle/itaniumdemangle-h/#ae2b0d0345572d6718e219aa76d1d54edab45cffe084dd3d20d928bee85e7b0f21">std::string</a> Path)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Set the path to a directory where to save generated object files.

This path can be used by a linker to request on-disk files instead of in-memory buffers. When set, results are available through <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/#ab7aef709e1748908f580b2a8427c5a0f">getProducedBinaryFiles()</a> instead of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/#a73f6c6916269fbca6fd4a36fa8435af4">getProducedBinaries()</a>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h/#l00201">201</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/lto/include/llvm/lto/legacy/thinltocodegenerator-h">ThinLTOCodeGenerator.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
